text:
Kiliaro | Stockholm | Full-Time

Kiliaro is the perfect home for your photos and videos, currently in closed beta.

The company consists of a small and experienced team hailing from Klarna, Spotify and TradeDoubler. You are especially interesting to us if you love writing applications for the web (React), Android or iOS. Backend developers should have an interest in Go.

If this sounds fun, reach out to arian@kiliaro.com.
